Description: Round-topped limestone stela with black painted detail: scene of the deceased woman standing before a libation-vessel on a stand worshipping Osiris and Isis; winged sun-disc with pendent uraei above; eight rows of Hieroglyphic text below.
Curator's comments: PM III (2): 744 J. Quaegebeur, Chronique d'Egypte 49 (1974), 69 (no. 20). Albersmeier, Unterschungen zu den Frauenstatuen, 95 n. 546.
